outline:
1. to delight in, take pleasure in, desire, be pleased with
    1. (Qal)
      1. of men
        1. to take pleasure in, delight in
        2. to delight, desire, be pleased to do
      2. of God
        1. to delight in, have pleasure in
        2. to be pleased to do
      3. to move, bend down
        1. (Qal) to bend down
kjv_def: [idiom] any at all, (have, take) delight, desire, favour, like, move, be (well) pleased, have pleasure, will, would.
strongs_def: properly, to incline to; by implication (literally but rarely) to bend; figuratively, to be pleased with, desire
